subject: Fishing, Commercial
Fish and Other Marine Life
lead_paragraph: In New York, where the start of trout season on April 1 signals an annual rite of spring, the number of licenses issued has declined for a dozen years, which also reflects a national trend.
snippet: In New York, where the start of trout season on April 1 signals an annual rite of spring, the number of licenses issued has declined for a dozen years, which also reflects a national trend.
